attrs.script:
#!/bin/bash
set -ex

yum install -y python

curl -O -L https://fah.stanford.edu/file-releases/public/release/fahclient/centos-5.3-64bit/v7.4/fahclient-7.4.4-1.x86_64.rpm
curl -O -L https://fah.stanford.edu/file-releases/public/release/fahcontrol/centos-5.3-64bit/v7.4/fahcontrol-7.4.4-1.noarch.rpm
curl -O -L https://fah.stanford.edu/file-releases/public/release/fahviewer/centos-5.3-64bit/v7.4/fahviewer-7.4.4-1.x86_64.rpm

rpm -i --nodeps fahclient-7.4.4-1.x86_64.rpm
rpm -i --nodeps fahcontrol-7.4.4-1.noarch.rpm
rpm -i --nodeps fahviewer-7.4.4-1.x86_64.rpm

ln -s /usr/lib/python2.6/site-packages/fah /usr/lib/python2.7/site-packages

action_list.description: System action for creating an application
